titles.title: Middle Class Investor Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on the capital loss carryovers of individuals to $20,000.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E209)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
2/4/2009--Introduced.
Middle Class Investor Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $20,000 the limitation on the amount of losses from the sale or exchange of capital assets that an individual taxpayer may deduct in a taxable year.
